verses.name: Joshua 19:22
verses.text: And the coast reacheth to Tabor, and Shahazimah, and Beth–shemesh; and the outgoings of their border were at Jordan: sixteen cities with their villages.

verses.name: Joshua 19:23
verses.text: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Issachar according to their families, the cities and their villages.

verses.name: Joshua 19:24
verses.text: And the fifth lot came out for the tribe of the children of Asher according to their families.

verses.name: Joshua 19:25
verses.text: And their border was Helkath, and Hali, and Beten, and Achshaph,

verses.name: Joshua 19:26
verses.text: And Alammelech, and Amad, and Misheal; and reacheth to Carmel westward, and to Shihor–libnath;
